name: Call of the VoYD Genesis
storyline:
A mysterious portal has opened up, leading to a strange and dangerous dimension filled with powerful creatures and otherworldly dangers. Legend has it that those who brave the portal and emerge victorious will be rewarded with unimaginable riches and fame beyond measure.

As a skilled adventurer and master of combat, you have decided to take on the challenge and enter the portal, joining forces with other brave warriors to face the endless waves of enemies that lie within.

The dimension you find yourself in is a twisted and chaotic place, filled with all manner of fearsome foes and treacherous traps. From the ferocious beasts of the ancient world to the robotic monstrosities of the future, every step you take will be met with danger.

But you are not alone in this treacherous realm. As you journey deeper into the portal, you will encounter other players, each with their own unique skills and abilities. Together, you must work as a team to overcome the challenges that lay ahead and emerge victorious.

The reward for your bravery is said to be great beyond measure, but only the strongest and most skilled adventurers will be able to claim it. Will you rise to the challenge and answer the Call of the VoYd, or will you fall to the endless waves of enemies that stand in your way?
summary: Top Down Action Shooter with Discord connect for competitions.
